info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

[ {The sweet smell of blood fills the Containment Unit. But why is blood sweet?}, {The thorns and prickly roses wrapped around $0. It hurts just looking at it.}, {$0 stares at #0.}, {"... Slay him, slay him! ..."}, ]
[ {#0 realizes the heavy sin that they had been carrying, and at the same time they understood that they had been freed from that sin.}, {Does $0 hate #0?}, ]
[ {One day, the punishment will eat up $0. Then, who will bear the the sin for them?}, {#0 racked their brains to think about how to obtain $0's blessing.}, {We should assume that $0 is happy.}, ]
[ {#0 despairs at the bleak prospect: their sins can never be atoned for, and $0's suffering will never end.}, {$0 must be the happiest man in the world.}, ]

collection.name: The Rose Stele of Revelation
collection.openText: The thorns have taken root and crowned thee, the roses press close within thy embrace.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result is Good, the employee will become a Lamb.
When the Lamb takes damage, the damage's 80% will be taken by $0.
Every time a certain amount of damage is taken, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.
The Qliphoth Counter decreases every time an Abnormality escapes.
When escaping, when any Abnormality in the facility takes damage, the damage is also taken by $0. When other Abnormalities takes damage, $0's attack movement will be interrupted.
When there are no employees in the room, $0 will constantly recover HP by 2% per second.
